author: mmusich
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48406

#### PR description:

Title says it all, the changes are made to use prescales for upcoming Oxy run in case we have more trigger rate for `TkAlMinbias` and `SiStripCalMinBias`.

#### PR validation:

None.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Verbatim backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48406 for the 2025 Small System run operations.
title: [15.0.X] in `run3_oxygen` eras use `triggerResultsFilterFromDB` instead of `HLTHighLevel`, in order to allow prescales
